page.title: 20SHOPS
page.content: Crich shops are well used by the people of Crich and the surrounding villages.The shops clustered round the Market Place are _ {R.Allsop _Baker Crich Food Market {Allens _ Chemist The Butchers Shop {Lester _Greengrocer The Woolshop {Fish and chip shop Woods'Papershop {Crich Pottery Post Office } Away from the Market Place _ {Harrisons General shop,Icecream and {Cafe,Longdons General Store,Joy Ladies {Hairstylist,D.Sellars and Son Garage {Shop,Windmill Upholstery,Sydnope Model {Shop,Silver Scissors Hairdresser. } There are also a {Pine workshop,Wood_ {yard,an Estate Agent,}and the { {National Westminster Bank.} Holloway has 4 shops_{Studio Pottery,a {Butchers,a Post Office and Village {Store,and Mayfields Store.} Whatstandwell has a {Post Office Store
